name: spfx-check-locale
description: Dynamically checks the consistency of your localization files inside SharePoint Framework projects, i.e. localization files match the schema inside "mystrings.d.ts" .

spfx-check-locale.definition.search.patt.description: Contains patterns to search your locale definition files (strings.d.ts). You can override the default one or add another if you use a folder with a different names for your localization files.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
